item.title: Tina add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Always do sober what you said you'd do drunk. That will teach you to keep your mouth shut." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Tina add a quote by Dean Martin
item.description: "I feel sorry for people who don't drink. When they wake up in the morning, that's as good as they're going to feel all day." -- Dean Martin

item.title: Tina add a quote by Hemingway, Ernest
item.description: "I drink to make other people more interesting." -- Hemingway, Ernest

item.title: Tina add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "That's the problem with drinking, I thought, as I poured myself a drink. If something bad happens you drink in an attempt to forget; if something good happens you drink in order to celebrate; and if nothing happens you drink to make something happen." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Tina add a quote by W. Somerset Maugham
item.description: "Cronshaw stopped for a moment to drink. He had pondered for twenty years the problem whether he loved liquor because it made him talk or whether he loved conversation because it made him thirsty." -- W. Somerset Maugham

item.title: Tina add a quote by P.G. Wodehouse
item.description: "I hadn't the heart to touch my breakfast. I told Jeeves to drink it himself." -- P.G. Wodehouse

item.title: Tina add a quote by Tom Petty
item.description: "I've learned one thing, and that's to quit worrying about stupid things. You have four years to be irresponsible here, relax. Work is for people with jobs. You'll never remember class time, but you'll remember the time you wasted hanging out with your friends. So stay out late. Go out with your friends on a Tuesday when you have a paper due on Wednesday. Spend money you don't have. Drink 'til sunrise. The work never ends, but college does..." -- Tom Petty

item.title: Tina add a quote by F. Scott Fitzgerald
item.description: "First you take a drink, then the drink takes a drink, then the drink takes you." -- F. Scott Fitzgerald

item.title: Tina add a quote by Benjamin Franklin
item.description:
"Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
[misquote of a letter about wine, see quotes/831031]" -- Benjamin Franklin

item.title: Tina add a quote by Humphrey Bogart
item.description: "The trouble with the world is that it's always one drink behind." -- Humphrey Bogart
